import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../App.css"; // Placeholder API fonksiyonları const fetchDealers = async () => []; const fetchSubDealers = async () => []; const fetchServices = async () => []; const fetchAccounts = async () => []; const fetchReports = async () => []; const fetchUsers = async () => []; const addUser = async (user) => {}; const menuItems = [ { key: "dealers", label: "Ana Bayiler", icon: "🏢" }, { key: "subdealers", label: "Alt Bayiler", icon: "🏬" }, { key: "services", label: "Yetkili Servisler", icon: "🛠️" }, { key: "accounts", label: "Cari Hesap Akışı", icon: "💳" }, { key: "reports", label: "Raporlama", icon: "📊" }, { key: "users", label: "Kullanıcı Yönetimi", icon: "👤" }, { key: "logout", label: "Çıkış", icon: "🚪" }, ]; export default function AdminPanelFull() { const [selected, setSelected] = useState("dealers"); const [showAddUser, setShowAddUser] = useState(false); // Örnek veri const dealers = [ { name: "main_dealer", region: "İstanbul" }, { name: "main_dealer2", region: "Ankara" }, ]; const subdealers = [{ name: "sub_dealer", parent: "main_dealer" }]; const services = [{ name: "servis1", parent: "main_dealer" }]; const accounts = [{ gelir: 12000, gider: 8000, bakiye: 4000 }]; const reports = [ { type: "Satış", tutar: 5000, tarih: "16.09.2025" }, { type: "Servis", tutar: 2000, tarih: "16.09.2025" }, ]; const users = [ { name: "superadmin", role: "Admin" }, { name: "main_dealer", role: "Ana Bayi" }, { name: "sub_dealer", role: "Alt Bayi" }, { name: "admintest", role: "Admin" }, ]; return (
